document_name: National Climate Change Strategy - Colombia Long Term Strategy - E2050
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/COL/2020/COL-2020-01-01-National Climate Change Strategy - Colombia Long Term Strategy - E2050_b99e414bdf8402fe948ff7bcfd80b731.pdf
document_description: This document sets long term objectives of low-carbon development and increasing resilience for Colombia. It encourages public participation to build the strategy itself.
